title: Lesson 85
paragraph: Direction and clarity improve communication. Clear guidance, concise information, and proper consultation enable effective decision-making.

words.example: Teachers have latitude in choosing teaching methods.

words.meaning: giving much information clearly in few words
words.example: She gave a concise summary of the report.

words.japaneseMeaning: 相談する、助言を求める
words.example: You should consult a doctor about your symptoms.

words.meaning: able to be flooded or overwhelmed
words.example: The riverbank is floodable during heavy rains.
Bonuses make employees incentiveable to work harder.

words.japaneseMeaning: 取ってくる、連れてくる
words.example: Please fetch me the book from the shelf.
He made a rational decision after careful thought.

words.meaning: able to be applied across an entire industry
words.japaneseMeaning: 業界全体に適用可能な

words.example: We need to link these databases for efficiency.
